html:
Nov 2 (Reuters) - Societe Generale SA SOGN.PA:: *GROUP IS COMMITTED TO THE FIGHT AGAINST CLIMATE CHANGE AND AIMS TO BE CARBON NEUTRAL BY 2050 *SHALE OIL AND GAS, OIL SANDS, EXTRA HEAVY CRUDE OIL, ARCTIC OIL, ECUADORIAN AMAZON OIL – NEW TRANSACTIONS DEDICATED TO THE EXPLORATION AND PRODUCTION OF THESE CATEGORIES OF HYDROCARBONS *SHALE OIL AND GAS, OIL SANDS, EXTRA HEAVY CRUDE OIL, ARCTIC OIL, ECUADORIAN AMAZON OIL – PURE UPSTREAM PLAYERS FOR WHICH THE ABOVE RESOURCES REPRESENT MORE THAN 30% OF *THEIR OVERALL PRODUCTION
*SHALE OIL AND GAS, OIL SANDS, EXTRA HEAVY CRUDE OIL, ARCTIC OIL, ECUADORIAN AMAZON OIL – DIVERSIFIED PLAYERS (UPSTREAM, MIDSTREAM, DOWNSTREAM) FOR WHICH EXPLORATION AND PRODUCTION OF THE ABOVE RESOURCES REPRESENT MORE THAN 30% OF THEIR REVENUES *LIQUEFIED NATURAL GAS IN NORTH AMERICA – NO NEW MANDATES FOR NEW PRODUCTION PROJECTS TO EXTEND EFFORTS DOWN THE VALUE CHAIN. *GROUP IS AHEAD OF SCHEDULE TO CONTRIBUTE MORE THAN €120BN TO THE ENERGY TRANSITION BETWEEN 2019 AND 2023 *PROTECTED AREAS – INCREASED PROTECTION OF BIODIVERSITY BY EXPANDING THE CATEGORIES OF PROTECTED AREAS IN WHICH NO NEW HYDROCARBON EXPLORATION AND PRODUCTION PROJECTS WILL BE FINANCED


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 02-NOV-202113:18:49 GMT
